Description:
Wonderful Family Home or Fool Proof Investment Property
This modern family home comes complete with all the added luxuries and is sure to impress upon inspection.
This brilliant floor plan is simple and flows with ease making the home feel ever so bright and open. Comprising of four good size bedrooms, with the main bedroom at the front of the home and hosts a walk-in robe and ensuite that's complete with single vanity, tiled shower and plenty of natural light. This bedroom also comes with a split system unit for heating and cooling in addition to the ceiling fan making it comfortable all year round. All other bedrooms have built-in robes, ceiling fans and share a large second bathroom.
While you walk through the home you will notice the abundance of space with two separate living areas. The hub and centre of the home is a spacious open plan living, meals and kitchen. The kitchen features upgraded stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, tiled splashback and a pantry.
This second living/dining zone opens up to the brilliant undercover alfresco area which comes just in time for BBQ season. The added extras don't end there. There's also ducted heating throughout and a double remote lock-up garage with internal access.
Located in a quiet estate and just moments from the Huntly IGA supermarket, Huntly Primary School and just 10 minutes from Bendigo's CBB, this home ticks all the boxes. Enquire quickly.

Description:
Invest, Refresh and Make This House a Home.
Add to the investment portfolio and bring in additional rental income with this Long Gully three-bedroom opportunity.
Or invest, refresh and occupy for yourself as a first home buyer; this home has plenty of potential to make it your comfortable retreat.
Set on a 493 square metre block and close to the Long Gully IGA, Showgrounds, North Bendigo Oval, carwash or a short drive into the CBD the location is set to delight.
Refurbishing and updating would be idyllic with its floor plan and original fittings creating the perfect foundations to bring this abode into the modern era while still highlighting its character.
The kitchen offers all the essentials including a dishwasher, stove oven, overhead storage and the perfect footprint for a fresh fitout.
Two of the bedrooms offer built-in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom and separate toilet.
Ceiling fans, gas heater in the lounge and a split system adds to this property's standout features and investment potential.
Outside is where the opportunity lays with the space providing an open canvas to create your own style.
A single carport, lock up dry room and a lean-to at the back of the backyard adds to home's storage options.
Arrange your private inspection today with agent Jesse Forbes.

Description:
Family-sized home in a peaceful pocket.
Life can't get much better than finding a family-sized home in a peaceful pocket a stone's throw from Bendigo CBD, LaTrobe University, schools, shopping, sporting facilities and public transport.
It's quietly nestled overlooking the bushland on a block approximately 1140m², with manicured, easy-care gardens lining the stencil paved concrete driveway. Inside is just as prim and pretty with the entry leading to the huge formal lounge and close by is the master bedroom with walk in robe and 3 piece ensuite. All bedrooms include built-in-robes and ceiling fans. The family bathroom consists of a bath, shower and vanity and is as neat as pin.
The kitchen is kitted out with gas/electric cooking, dishwasher, walk in pantry and plenty of bench space. The kitchen leads onto the generous dining/ living area.
The rear rumpus rooms is an exciting area which not only leads out to the beautiful rear yard, it also adjoins the central undercover alfresco area for all of your entertaining needs. The double garage provides access through to the rear yard all the way through to the huge 9m x 6m shed with power and concrete. The shed also has a convenient undercover storage area beside and behind for trailers, boats or bikes.
The big backyard is perfect for family footy and cricket matches with plenty of room for a future pool area.
Other features include central gas heating, evaporative cooling and plantation shutters.
Inspections will not disappoint.

Description:
TIMELESS FAMILY HOME ON 1500m2 ALLOTMENT
**You will be required to provide photo ID at all inspections. Due to current restrictions, anyone currently living in metropolitan Melbourne or Mitchell Shire will not be allowed access to any property until further notice.**
Situated in the ever expanding and affordable suburb of Epsom is this timeless brick veneer home sited on a generous 1525m2 and ready for the next family to call home. Standing the test of time and presented to a very high standard, the home is conveniently located just a stone's throw away from the Epsom Village shopping centre, Epsom Primary School, public transport and other local amenities.
The home exhibits a lovely renovated interior which will delight upon inspection. There are three full sized bedrooms on offer, with a separate study off the entry a possible fourth if needed. All bedrooms have built in robes, whilst the master bedroom boasts its own renovated ensuite. The main bathroom has also been recently updated and includes both bath and shower, whilst the laundry and separate toilet complete this wing. The main carpeted living space is quite large, and has a cosy gas log fire as the focal point and additional formal dining space at the rear. Split system heating and cooling provides temperature controil, as do ceiling fans in the bedrooms. The modern kitchen and adjoining meals area offers the family chef a space to shine! As new appliances include electric wall oven and grill, gas hot plates, and two drawer dishwasher, whilst there is ample bench and cupboard space too!
Outside is a beautifully established and landscaped allotment with space to enjoy your surrounds. Kids, grandkids and pets will thrive with the amount of room afforded, not to mention the joy and excitement the solar heated inground pool will bring with hours of entertainment ahead! For the home handy man or tinkerer, there is a two bay shed with roller door, power and concrete floor to hide yourself away in. To the front is a four car carport, return driveway and vehicle access to the rear yard.
This beautiful home is ready to be packed full of endless laughs and wonderful memories, just like our current vendors have enjoyed. Ideally suited to young families or retirees alike, this property will bring an end to your search. For any further information, or to book a private inspection, get in touch today to avoid disappointment.

Description:
Ease of Living and Style
Ease of living, functionality and style makes this modern home the ultimate little investor or family home.
Nestled in its quiet family friendly location, this three-bedroom two-bathroom home is just 1.5km from bustling Epsom Village.
With views of the front garden, a spacious and modern master suite boasts a large walk-in robe and stylish ensuite with warm natural finishes.
Walk through the wide and open hallway and your light and bright open concept kitchen dining and living space offers all the essentials including an abundance of storage options and modern appliances.
The two remaining bedrooms at the back of the home feature plenty of natural light and built-in robes and is serviced by another contemporary light filled bathroom.
A double lock-up garage with backyard and internal access and ducted heating and cooling makes up the rest of this home's standout features.
With Epsom Village, Epsom Primary School, train station, medical facilities, child care and Epsom Huntly Recreation Reserve on your doorstep, move straight in and go at your own pace to co-ordinate updates if needed.
Currently tenanted at $340pw.

Description:
Optimal Family Home and Happiness
Oozing with style, luxury and optimal family happiness, welcome home to 55 Kulmani Street.
From the designer front facade, quality finishes from door to door, right through to a grand alfresco living and impressive backyard, this four-bedroom, three-living, two-bathroom family home is set to impress the moment you pull into the driveway.
Imagine coming home to retreat and relax in your grand master suite, boasting an abundance of space, plush carpets, feature wall, walk-in robe and stunning master ensuite featuring his and hers vanity and large shower.
The quality and style continue to flow into the open plan kitchen, meals and living area; the kitchen showcasing stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, island breakfast bench and high-end finishes. Improve your energy efficiency and carbon footprint with the home's 20 panel solar system. Plush carpets, timber flooring, feature walls, built-in storage throughout and a grand master bathroom with bath also adds to the home's appeal.
Control the climate with ease all year round with ducted heating and cooling.
The alfresco area is the highlight of the home boasting a quality pitch-roof patio with ceiling fans, built-in bar bench and steel railing fence. Overlooking the rest of the yard with tree lined views, easily entertain guests while you keep an eye on the kids.
A designated fire pit area, double remote garage, quality garden shed and established and beautiful garden beds adds to the outside features of this home.
Just 1.7km to Neangar Park Golf Course and Lake Tom Thumb and a short drive to shops, amenities and cafes, this near new five-year-old home is one not to miss.

Description:
Lifestyle Property on 2 Acres
This very generously proportioned Sandstone look residence on an elevated 2 acre block has been built to make the most of the northerly aspect. Located less than 10 minutes from Kangaroo Flat Shopping Centre and approx. 20 minutes to Bendigos CBD. Within the heart of the home a spacious open plan living area (with cosy solid fuel heater) incorporates a delightful kitchen with quality electric appliances,updated dishwasher, great storage and ample bench space. Large windows enable lots of natural light and great views. The main bedroom is impressive with WIR including shelving plus a 3 piece ensuite. The secondary 2 bedrooms both have triple robes. The 4th bedroom is huge and quite versatile being ideally suited as a rumpus room, playroom or over sized study. The family bathroom features a bath,shower, vanity and separate toilet. Great sized laundry offering copious cupboard and bench space. Expansive verandahs at the front and side of the home provide a great place to sit and relax.Family and friends will enjoy spending time in the private garden area under a magnificent shady tree, ideal area for parties and entertaining. Another great place to sit and relax is by the picturesque dam.Car accommodation has not been overlooked with a total of 9 carport spaces plus a fantastic oversized double garage which includes a fan and pot belly could easily be a great party room, workshop or gym. The home has ducted refrigerated heating and cooling, 5 kw solar system, newish instant gas hws, approx 66,000 litres of tank water storage, bore with pump,waste water treatment system, cubby house, garden shed and much more.
If you are looking for a lifestyle property, whether it is somewhere you can have a few chickens, grow your vegies and fruit trees, a pony for the kids, maybe to have some fun on a little peewee or just lots of space to enjoy, then this is it.

Description:
Neat as a pin
This neat brick veneer home will appeal to the whole gamut of buyers being in a quiet cul-de sac just three kilometres from the Bendigo CBD. The freshly painted home features three bedrooms, all with built-in robes and a convenient two-way bathroom. There is also a separate formal lounge at the entrance. A spacious open-plan kitchen, meals and light-filled living area overlooks the rear yard with sliding doors opening to a covered and paved alfresco area.
The kitchen includes gas cooker, range hood and island bench/breakfast bar while both gas heating and a split system air conditioner take care of internal temperature control. With a block size bigger than other homes in this price range, it includes newly landscaped gardens in both the front and rear yard. The single side carport is secured with a roller door and has room for a second vehicle or trailer long ways while the garden shed can take care of the mower and bikes. Great position, close to public transport and local cafes, this homes offers great security for occupants of all ages.
Appraised rental return is approximately $320 per week, making this property an attractive investment option.

Description:
Strathdale Stunner!
Stately one-owner family home boasts impeccable street appeal combined with a spacious streamlined interior. The owners have done all the hard work leaving you to move in and start living.
Offering a welcoming feel, the tiled front entry opens to the formal lounge with bay window and main suite incorporating walk-in robe and updated ensuite.
The heart of the home presents an impressive open plan kitchen with solid timber cabinetry, corner walk-in pantry, dishwasher and gas/electric appliances. The dining area overlooking the rear yard basks in northern light while the family room includes a cleverly concealed study nook behind bifold doors and glass sliders access the sun-drenched paved alfresco area.
The plus-sized laundry features a wall of storage and benches while three more bedrooms (BIR), main bathroom and WC occupy a separate wing.
Outside, the backyard is child and pet-proof while privacy is paramount with a tall perimeter of hedges around lush lawns for family footy or cricket matches.
The Doug Wearne built home is as good as the day it was finished and includes an endless list of features like ducted heating and cooling, higher ceilings, ceiling fans, auto double garage with rear roller door and a small tool shed.
The location is hard to beat - enjoy the exceptional privacy and tranquillity in this quiet yet super convenient pocket. It's short walking distance to everything, such as Strath and Kennington Village Shopping Centre, cafes, restaurants, medical practice, local pub, Kennington Reservoir, schools, LaTrobe university and sporting facilities,
Designed for family living, 12 Wildwood Drive is a must to inspect for serious buyers.

Description:
Regent Park - Strathfieldsaye
Here's your chance to secure a block in an already booming established estate with its own children's playground, Jenny's Early Learning Centre and easy access to public transport!
Perfect for families and only a quick drive to Bendigo CBD.
The beautiful open entrance gives way to plenty of space, with approximately 3 acres of park filled with native and exotic trees and bushland, 800m of walking paths as well as benches and shelter making the perfect spot to get together. All allotments are titled and are waiting to be built on.
580m2 corner allotment, flat ground and great views of the park, this land is ready to be built on.
Situated on the corner of Park Village Terrace and Marylebone Circuit with a frontage of 11.27m offering great side access of 27m.

Description:
VICTORIAN COTTAGE WITH SENSATIONAL SCOPE
Walking distance to the centre of Bendigo and Lake Weeroona, this charming Victorian cottage offers incredible possibility. Ideally positioned for a buyer seeking heritage character combined with inner-city proximity, this property provides incredible scope.
Sitting behind a picket fence, decked stairs lead through the garden up to the wide verandah. Indoors, the central hallway and front rooms offer high, timber-lined ceilings, timber flooring, sash windows and dado boards. Both of these two bedrooms are generously proportioned and one offers an air conditioner.
At the end of the hall is a light-filled open plan kitchen, living and dining space. The island bench in the centre of the kitchen enjoys modern appliances, and French doors from the living space open out to the rear yard. Off the dining space is a door through to a large bathroom and at the back of the house is a laundry with toilet.
A verandah off the rear of the home sits over a brick paved area, ideal for alfresco dining. The low-maintenance rear garden offers plenty of space and scope, and more than enough room for a modern extension (STCA). With private and secure fencing and a large shed at the back of the allotment, there is space for vehicle parking if required.
Additional features include:
Air conditioner and gas heater
Modern kitchen appliances including oven, four-burner gas cooktop and dishwasher
Heritage features throughout including high, timber-lined ceilings; timber flooring; dado boards and sash windows
Carriageway easement providing vehicle access to the rear yard
Large shed
With character and charm, this lovely Victorian cottage sits in a pretty street close to the shops and amenities at the heart of Bendigo. Located less than five minutes walk from the CBD, this property is absolutely ideal for a buyer looking to establish a quality short-term rental or for someone wanting to add value to an existing property. With so much opportunity to create something truly unique, this is a fantastic chance to secure a home full of possibility.
Insights: 33 Hopetoun Street, Bendigo VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 25 other 2 bedroom house in Bendigo have recently been sold.

Description:
NEAT & TIDY HOME WITH LARGE SHED
Within easy reach of bus stops, sporting facilities including Neangar Golf Course and Eaglehawk Secondary College, this neat and tidy weatherboard home sits in a quiet court with good neighbours. A double carport and wide driveway offers excellent off street parking and security doors at the front and rear add extra safety.
The front door opens into an entry hall with coat closet, and doors either side open into the main living space. To one side, a sizeable lounge enjoys ample natural light, and to the other, a kitchen diner. The kitchen, renovated a few years ago, provides plenty of storage.
A door separates the living areas from the bedrooms and this hallway also leads to a laundry with access to the side of the house; and a large family bathroom with separate toilet. The three bedrooms are all generously proportioned, one with a built-in robe and the remaining two feature double built-in robes.
A glass sliding door from the dining room opens out to a spacious alfresco area. Neat garden beds and a lawn area make up much of the private and secure backyard. A ramp from the garden up to the laundry door allows easy access. The large shed at the rear of the backyard can be accessed via double gates from the carport at the front of the house.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling
Ducted floor heating
Kitchen appliances including dishwasher and stove with four-burner gas cooktop and separate grill
Security doors on all doors
Double gates allowing vehicle access from carport to backyard
Large shed at rear (8m x 8m) with tilt panel double door, concrete flooring, lights and power
Water tank
Neat and tidy, this home provides plenty of scope for someone wanting to make it their own. Perfect for a first-time buyer looking to step on to the property ladder, or equally suitable for an investor or downsizer seeking a practical home.
Insights: 5 Hunter Avenue, California Gully VIC 3556 was last sold in 2020 and 52 other 3 bedroom house in California Gully have recently been sold.

Description:
BRAND NEW, CLOSE TO SHOPS WITH AN OUTLOOK
A brand-new townhouse offering a lot more than most. The property is only one of two on the land parcel and offers an outlook to a Crown Reserve, yet it is only two blocks from Eaglehawk's main street. This means you have minimal neighbours, hardly any traffic and a huge front yard that you don't have to maintain!!
The home has been custom built by a local company and boasts two spacious, carpeted bedrooms with built-in-robes; the main suite also boasts its own en-suite including a toilet, shower and fitted vanity basin; the second bathroom is spacious and boasts a 1200mm shower, separate bath and vanity unit.
Living space consists of an open plan north-facing living - meals area with quality timber vinyl planks throughout. The adjacent kitchen has plenty of storage, 600mm gas hot plates and an electric oven, soft-close drawers, a pantry and plenty of bench space. There's a large sliding door leading to the covered alfresco space, there's also room for a veggie patch.
There's a second toilet, good sized laundry and storage throughout, the walls and ceiling are well insulated and there is a large reverse-cycle split-system positioned in the living area for year-round comfort.
Out front is a single auto garage with internal and external entries, there's parking space for a second vehicle and as mentioned, minimal neighbours and an outlook towards a paddock that you don't have to maintain!!
Schools, shops and transport are all handy, you really do get the best of both worlds.
Insights: 20 Market Street, Eaglehawk VIC 3556 was last sold in 2020 and 14 other 2 bedroom house in Eaglehawk have recently been sold.

Description:
Welcome home!
Situated on an expansive 4,125m² block amongst a charming bush setting, is this one year young, four-bedroom, two-bathroom custom built Paul Gray family home.
A quality build to stand the test of time, 168 Pasley Street is immaculately presented. Step inside the front door to find a grand entrance boasting gorgeous floating floorboards throughout.
The spacious master suite, located on the left of the entry has a large walk in wardrobe, followed by a huge 4-piece ensuite hosting floor to ceiling ashy tiles, off-set his and hers basins and secluded shower and toilet.
The high spec home is centralised around the large kitchen and living room with a grand 14 foot cathedral ceiling and large island benchtop with waterfall edging that holds the double sink, dishwasher and plenty of storage underneath. Opposite the island benchtop you will find a quality 900mm free-standing cooker and range-hood under the elevated ceiling. The kitchen is topped off with a large walk-in butler's pantry.
The sliding doors from the dining area open up to the rest of the home including another living area and the remaining three bedrooms, all with built-in robes and surrounding the main bathroom. Ducted Refrigerated Cooling & Heating throughout the home, with full zoning capabilities.
Externally, the fully decked, undercover alfresco area provides more than enough space for entertaining your family and friends. Surrounding the property is a blank canvas ready for the home's new owner to put the final touches on this brand-new flawless property!
Properties like this don't last long so contact Toby Gray to arrange a private inspection.
Contact us to book your digital inspection with the agent.
(ENOE)

Description:
GREAT TOWNHOUSE JUST FIVE MINUTES FROM CITY
This neat and tidy townhouse is positioned in a quiet and private complex, set well back off the road. A contemporary build, the home offers low-maintenance living both inside and out. With a bus stop not far from the front door, and the Bendigo Showgrounds just down the road, the townhouse is positioned just minutes from the amenities of Eaglehawk, White Hills and the centre of the city.
With a private driveway for tenants leading to the secure front door, there is easy and safe access to the property. The main entry opens into a light-filled, open plan kitchen, living and dining room. The kitchen enjoys granite benchtops, modern appliances and good storage throughout.
A small hallway from the kitchen leads to two bedrooms, both with built-in robes. The master bedroom features ensuite access to the two-way family bathroom, and a separate toilet and large laundry with good storage completes the floorplan.
A glass sliding door from the living area, and a door from the laundry, both open out to a quiet and private rear yard. The carport at one side of the property also leads out to this area, which allows potential for a garden or sunny alfresco space.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling
Kitchen appliances including four-burner gas cooktop, oven and dishwasher
Secure access from both sides of the property into the rear garden
Carport with private automated roller door
Excellent rental potential
Sitting in a private and quiet complex, this contemporary townhouse is perfect for an investor seeking a quality rental option, or for a buyer wanting a low-maintenance property that allows them the freedom to enjoy easy living.

Description:
Location and Lifestyle in Spring Gully
A freshly renovated home in a prime Bendigo location makes this an ideal little property package.
From its new roof, bathroom, kitchen, tiles, carpets right down to rewiring, plastering, insulation and plumbing, all the hard work has been done for you.
Imagine being either a short walk or drive away from La Trobe University, schools, kindergartens, day cares, parks, local shops and public transport - the Spring Gully location is a standout.
Set on a generous 602m2 block sits this two-bedroom one-bathroom weatherboard home complete with a concreted and powered shed.
Cook up a storm in your modern and spacious kitchen featuring an abundance of storage, modern appliances and light fittings, and relax and unwind in your open concept living area.
A complete new fit out in the bathroom is another highlight with its modern tiling, vanity and warming colour palette.
Split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans, a separate laundry with storage, undercover entertaining patio and secure backyard adds to the features of this home.
Ideal in location and opportunities to add your own personal touches, makes 110A Osborne Street an ideal investment.

Description:
Location a prize plus enviable size
It's not surprising Strathfieldsaye continues to appeal, offering a peaceful country lifestyle focussed on families and a strong sense of community. Coupled with numerous local conveniences, it's also merely 7.5 kilometres from comprehensive amenities in central Bendigo. However, this property has many more particularly attractive attributes to tempt city-dwellers slightly further afield to its enviable address.
Firstly, at 1050m2 (approximately), the dream of owning quarter acre in a terrific location can now be realised. Set back from the road by a 40 metre driveway allowance enhances privacy and greatly reduces traffic noise. At 5 metres wide, it could perhaps even accommodate dual lanes!
Prospects of building within a fairly square site measuring 26x31 metres enables extensive variety of prospective floorplans. Mature gum trees from bordering neighbours borrow a superb backdrop for future landscaping and outdoor living, plus pleasant views from indoors. Saving costs, some boundaries are already fenced, and all services are readily available to the block.
Dinner and drinks at Braidie's Tavern are well within staggering distance and Greater Bendigo National Park is just a few paddocks away! Other local amenities include pre and primary schools plus bowls club is a 6 minute cycle or 18 walk, with football and netball club even closer. An extra 200 metres puts shops and supermarket on the list. La Trobe uni is an 18 minute bus or bike ride from here, add 6 to reach central Bendigo by the same means, or drive the 7.5 kilometres in under 10 minutes.
So, what's not to love?
